Class SmartRandom

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Random
      • org.apache.lucene.util.SmartRandom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class SmartRandom
extends Random
    A random that tracks if its been initialized properly, and throws an exception if it hasn't.
